#labels Featured
<font color="#000000" size="6">*Donate*</font>

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

This project is created by Nicolas Mollet and is by no means affiliated with Google. Free time is used to create and share icons for the Google Maps community.  If you feel this project is useful to you and want to support it and its future development please consider donating money.  We only ask for a small donation of *€5*, but of course we appreciate any amount. Please note that donations to us are not tax-deductible for income tax purposes.

==How to donate==
The easiest way to donate to the project is by sending money with [https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=nico.mollet%40gmail%2ecom PayPal ] to nico.mollet(at)gmail.com.  You can donate with PayPal by using your credit card but note that PayPal will take a small processing fee if you don't already have a free PayPal account and don't feel like setting one up. If you prefer you can also transfer money by bank, send an [mailto:nico.mollet(at)gmail.com e-mail] to get the correct banking details.  If you want to remain anonymous and not have your name appear in the list below, please let us know. 

===How to use PayPal===
Donating with PayPal is as quick and easy as 4 clicks and one amount away!

[https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=Nico%2eMollet%40gmail%2ecom&lc=US&item_name=Nicolas%20Mollet%20%28Google%20Maps%20Icons%29&item_number=GoogleMapsIcons&currency_code=EUR&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donate_SM%2egif%3aNonHosted https://www.paypal.com/en_US/i/btn/x-click-butcc-donate.gif]

Click or Right-click and choose "Open Link in New Tab" on PayPal Donate icon above to be transferred to the PayPal site. There you start by entering your donation amount and click "Update Total" on the top of the page.  After that you either log in to your existing PayPal account or create a new one.  Once you have done this you have the option to "Add special instructions to seller", for instance that you want to remain anonymous, before you click the yellow "Donate €(your amount) Now"-button down to the right and you are done and we are very grateful.
